r2pptx

r2pptx leverages the power of the officer package and the ease of use of powerpoint templates to form a simple and easy to use API to create powerpoint slide decks straight from R.

Installation

You can install the released version of r2pptx from Github:

devtools::install_github("mattle24/r2pptx")

Documentation is available online or through the vignettes.

Thank you

Thank you to David Gohel for the officeverse packages – r2pptx is a wrapper around David’s excellent work, thank you so much!

Also thank you to Hadley Wickham and Jenny Bryan for an introduction to S4 in Advanced R and a guide to package developmemt!
